message.body: heey punk, how was the w/e?
hi! it was torture. i felt like i was working slave labor making those table runners-- how was yours?
now you know how all those chinese kids feel. Mine was good. Adam start his job yet?
haha
and i dont wantt to talk about that
what?
I thought you would be glad, you're getting to be as bad as I am
becuase that fucking shits not happening--and i dont want tot alk about it. its more than a slightly sore spot for me right now lol
how was your weekend?
good, went out on sat night to see the band play. Jen brought her "friend"
'friend'?
whats that mean?
well she tried to set us up before, but I wasnt interested
haha
does that hold still?
yeah, Im still not interested. But we did hang out. Shes nice enough, but not my type
whats 'your type'?
sorry. a lot of distractions today. I dont have a type. She's not my type is just what i say when Im not attracted to someone
haha thats rather broad
and same here with the distractions--the office has been fucking crazy with this weather
it's a weird time of year
We don't actually have much work, which just makes it all that easier to procrastinate
i hear that
we'll have to catch up soon so you can vent all your frustrations out on me
hahaha something like that. and yes, we do!
just let me know what you're sched looks like.
i will! just a matter of finding the energy too
yeah I hear ya. Im practically a hermit when the weathers like this
me tooo. not looking forward to the ice storm tomorrow either. especially when they NEVER close the office
you may just want to stay there
thinking about it. ill set up my sleeping bag in the storage office along with the leaking ceiling tiles.
yeeeah let me know how that does. Hey I need to get photos in your development
oh yea? where at?
fantasia
I should get them now but I dont feel like it
oh wait, I can't! Finns home from school and no one is here
excuses!
no fer real!
if not then I have to get them tomorrow
